content: Tung ha creato un panino per hamburger con le caratteristiche protuberanze e sporgenze che ricordano quelle del microscopico virus stesso.
translations: eng:Tung fashioned a hamburger bun with characteristic bumps and protrusions resembling those found on the microscopic virus
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
